product_description: More than just a pretty gift, these dainty earrings feature a choice of bezeled stones with a mystical meaning behind each.
product_details_and_care:
More than just a pretty gift, these dainty earrings feature a choice of bezeled stones with a mystical meaning behind each. Choose lapis for wisdom, howlite for tranquility, labradorite for balance, blue lace agate for creativity, black onyx for power or rose quartz for love.
7/8" drop; 1/2" width
Hinge with snap post closure
18k-gold plate/lapis or howlite or labradorite or blue lace agate or black onyx or rose quartz
Imported
Item ships in a gift box
Item #6020977
